short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your day with Daily Boost! Receive inspiring quotes and motivational messages to fuel your positivity and energy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Boost is your companion for uplifting quotes and empowering messages that aim to make each day a little brighter. Start your day with a positive mindset and the encouragement you need to tackle challenges and pursue your goals.

How to Use:
1. Install Daily Boost.
2. Click on the extensions in your browser toolbar.
3. Pin Daily Boost to your toolbar.
4. Click Daily Boost icon.
3. Embrace the uplifting quote of the day and let it empower you.
